remarks: A collection of ordered pairs with an extension of a binary relation is a set.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Nov-2017.)  (Revised by BJ/AV, 20-Jun-2019.)  (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
statement: opabbrex $p |- ( ( A. x A. y ( x R y -> ph ) /\ { <. x , y >. | ph } e. V ) -> { <. x , y >. | ( x R y /\ ps ) } e. _V ) $.
